ak47tactic.full: Modernized variant of the AK-47. The case is made of steel and impact-resistant plastic. Introduced into service with the Soviet Army in 1959

beretta.full: The model 92 was designed in 1972 by Carlo Beretta, Giuseppe Mazetti and Vittorio Valle - final design in 1975. A 9 mm Beretta 92F pistol replaced a 45-caliber M1911 pistol as a standard US Army pistol with the designation M9.

crossbow1.full: The Crossbow was designed for military special forces. Delivered by traders from Europe.

crossbow2.full: This crossbow is for hunting all kinds of animals. Manufacturer is unknown.

dp_28.full: The Degtyaryov machine gun was accepted for Red Army service in 1927 with the official designation DP-27. For reasons that are unclear, it is often called the DP-28. It is possible, since the Soviets generally named equipment referring to the first year of use

mg3.full: The MG 3 is a German general-purpose machine gun. The MG 3 was standardized in the late 1950s and adopted into service with the newly formed Bundeswehr. Skilled craftsmen made it to use popular caliber.

mg34_lmg.full: The Maschinengewehr 34, or MG 34, is a German recoil-operated air-cooled machine gun, first tested in 1929, introduced in 1934, and issued to units in 1936. Appeared in USSR after the WWII. Skilled craftsmen made it to use popular caliber.

mp40.full: The MP 40 (Maschinenpistole 40) is a submachine gun developed in Nazi Germany and used extensively by the Axis powers vs USSR during World War II.

svu.full: The OTs-03 SVU (Sniper Rifle Shortened) is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON

amd65.full: AMD-65 is a Hungarian-manufactured licensed variant of the venerable AKM rifle. Skilled craftsmen removed the folding stock and single fire mode, turned it into the killing tool for close quarters combat. It is adapted for 5.45.

amd65n.full: AMD-65 is a Hungarian-manufactured licensed variant of the venerable AKM rifle. Front handle is installed for convenience of firing short and long bursts.

dp_28rust.full: Rusty machinegun. Perhaps just a waste of ammo, but in skillful hands this can kill an elephant.

fg42.full: The FG 42 - paratrooper rifle 42 is a selective-fire automatic rifle produced in Nazi Germany during World War II. After World War II thousands of salvaged FG-42 were brought to the USSR. After the Third World War guns were plundered by stalkers and Handymen remade rifles to shoot Soviet ammo.

g43.full: The Gewehr 43 is a semi-automatic rifle developed by Germany during World War II. G-43 is modification of earlier Gewehr 41 rifle with the changed exhaust system similar to the Soviet SVT-40 rifle. It is adapted for common ammo type.

g43s.full: The Gewehr 43 is a semi-automatic rifle with a developed by Germany during World War II. This particular model has a attached sight and adapted for common ammo type.

luger08.full: The Pistole Parabellum, commonly known as just Luger — is a toggle-locked recoil-operated semi-automatic pistol produced in several models and by several nations from 1898 to 1948. After Third war was adapted for common ammo type.

luger08rust.full: Rusty German World War II pistol. Was adapted for common ammo type.

m76.full: The Zastava M76 is a military semi-automatic sniper/designated marksman rifle developed and manufactured by Zastava Arms in Yugoslavia.

mg34_lmgrust.full: Rusty MG-34 machinegun. Perhaps it's just a waste of ammo, but in skillful hands can kill an elephant.

mg3rust.full: Rusty MG-3 machinegun. Perhaps it's just a waste of ammo, but in skillful hands can kill an elephant.

mp40rust.full: Rusty echo of World War II.

oc2.full: The OTS-02 Kiparis (ОЦ-02 Кипарис, Russian for cypress) submachine gun was designed by the TsKIB SOO design bureau of Tula during the early 1970s but was not introduced into service until 1972. It is primarily intended for internal security and police units.

pmmd63.full: The Pistol Mitraliera model 1963 (abbreviated PM md. 63 or simply md. 63) is Romanian assault rifle patterned after the AKM, and chambered in the 7.62×39mm cartridge.

pmmd65.full: The Romanian Pistol Mitraliera model 1965 (abbreviated PM md. 65 or simply md. 65) is assault rifle patterned after the AKM.  This is the underfolding-stock version of the md. 63.

stg44.full: An echo of World War II in the aftermath of the Third war. The StG 44 is a German selective-fire rifle developed during World War II. It is also known as the MP 43 and MP 44. Remade for the Soviet common ammo. Fans of conspiracy theories call him the primogenitor of AK, however, it's built scheme completely corresponds the American M16.

stg44rust.full: Rusty echo of World War II.

petrol.full: This classical fuel appeared in the Wastes thanks to Central Asian Gas barons. It is considered rare.
petrol.fail: You managed to damage a plastic bottle and invaluable gas poured on the ground and your boots...

koja.full: Well-cut pieces of leather. Can be sold or used in craft.

shkurs.full: The skin of a dead animal. Can be sold or used in craft.

encounter.wolfsnights: You fell into the trap of a wolf pack. A huge pack of wolves is now approaching you.
encounter.spidernights: You have fallen into the spider's lair. Spiders are coming close!
encounter.bearhigh: You hear a loud bear roar nearby. Finally you noticed that bears are approaching you,
encounter.wolflider: A wolf pack surrounds you, among them you notice a strange Leader.
encounter.deidont: Something or someone is approaching you, making very loud sounds as it moves.
encounter.devourer: You heard the terrible sounds of an unknown animal, and noticed that something was approaching you from the thicket.
encounter.defence_1: In the distance, the sounds of gunfire and fighting are heard. Having listened, you can hear the clear cries of people who are asking for help
encounter.fight_6: You hear the whining sounds of some animals and the terrible roar of a monster
encounter.fight_5: You hear the sounds of the struggle. Having listened, you hear a loud howl and a squeak of mice.
encounter.fight_4: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_3: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_2: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_1: You heard the sounds of a fight, especially the loud howling of wolves and the bear's roar.
encounter.ratsnights: You have fallen into a rat trap. A huge number of rats are rapidly approaching you.
encounter.roi: You have noticed the rapid approach of small shadows from the forest.
encounter.Ants_2: You have fallen into the Myrmica anthill. A large number of Myrmicas are approaching you.
encounter.fail_skip_ph: You did not manage to avoid battle!
encounter.ph_caravan_1: You have noticed the car with well armed group.
encounter.mole: You hear as earth beneath you begins to shiver. Agressive bugs get on the surface from all directions.
encounter.defence2: The cannonade is heard in the distance. Having approached slightly closer, you have noticed that hunters fight for their lives with local fauna.
encounter.lacodon: You notice strange hillocks in the earth. Suddenly hillocks come to life, similar to huge iguanas with full mouths of poisonous teeth.
encounter.trap_1: After you leave the city you have noticed that someone watches you. These are local bandits and they quickly get closer to you.
encounter.ph_caravan_2: You have noticed an old car with a group of armed men.
encounter.defence_2night: The cannonade is in the distance heard. Having approached slightly closer, you have noticed that people fight for their lives with awful monsters.
encounter.Mutashiftnights: You hear firing, shouts and howling. Probably someone has stumbled upon a pack of wolves
encounter.lizardnights: At night it becomes too hot in the Dead City. Monsters come out of darkness and close in.
encounter.bigratsnights: The pack of huge rats attacks you.
encounter.lizardshiftnights: You hear firing and shouts. Probably someone has run into terrible monsters.
encounter.Mutanights: The pack of hungry wolves attacks.
encounter.bigratshiftnights: You see as the pack of huge rats attacks shift workers.

ph_craft_book2_dog.full: Detailed pattern of dog backpack with armor for the pet

armor1.full: Civilian armor of foreign production. Delivered by merchants from Europe.

armor1black.full: The black color version of civilian body armor.

armor1green.full: Hunting version of a civilian body armor.

ctw_armor2.full: Police bulletproof vest. In a good condition.

ctw_head_1rust.full: Rusty Soviet helmet of the pilot.

ctw_light_1.full: Tactical vest with elements of armor. Good capacity and ease of use make it popular.

ctw_light_2.full: High-tech military vest. Production is somewhere in the Middle East.

ctw_light_2amer.full: Captured as a trophy American flag is used in this vest.

ctw_light_2digital.full: The vest uses digital camouflage created in 1984. High efficiency and low profile make it popular among stalkers.

ctw_light_2snake.full: The vest uses gray digital camouflage created in 1984. High efficiency and low profile make it popular among stalkers.

ctw_light_3.full: Vest of foreign production of excellent quality. There is a basic protection.

ctw_light_4.full: High-quality lightweight vest. Very comfortable and ergonomic.

ctw_light_5.full: The origin of this armor is unknown. For the first time was delivered by a merchant from the Middle East. The quality of materials and armor performance is fascinating.

ctw_light_6.full: Very versatile, completed with basic body armor.

ctw_light_7.full: It is in great demand among hunters and fishermen. Good capacity and comfortable pockets, what else is needed?

gasmass.full: Protective mask with goggles in good condition, delivered by traders from the Middle East.

tacticshield.full: Old shockproof shield in good condition, designed for use by special forces of various law enforcement agencies.

backpack2.full: Popular model among wasteland stalkers. They say that it brings good luck.

backpack5.full: An excellent backpack for distant travels.

dog_backpack.full: Armor with a backpack for your pet. It is hand made.

gasmass1.full: The American M17 gas mask was released in 1958. Passed the Vietnam jungle and still, apparently, smells of napalm. The rare guest in Wastelands as it was delivered in small amounts by dealers from Europe, or remained as a trophy here.

gasmass2.full: The latest Soviet gas mask which came to the army on the eve of war. In comparison with civil analogs has higher degree of protection and the increased viewing angle that allows easy firing with weapons sights.

gasmass3.full: Soviet civilian gas mask, the best friend of all pioneers and workers. It was made since 1961 in such huge volumes, and now, many years after the war, it can still be found everywhere.

headpanama.full: It was supposed to be used combined with a steel helmet. Then it was widespread named Panama. However it is more preferable to speak of a subtropical helmet because this product was developed on a sample of the 1935 cotton NKVD subtropical helmet.

m42.full: A German steel helmet created in 1942 (Stahlhelm Modell 42) — the infantry helmet approved as a standard general helmet for armed forces of the Third Reich in the summer of 1942.

m42_rust.full: Rusty M42 steel helmet. Rusty German steel helmet created in 1942.

quests.ph_trade1_quest: [Phenomenon] Alexander, the trader, asked you to bring him fuel. 50 liters should be enough.
quests.ph_trade2_quest: [Phenomenon] Bogdan, the trader, asked you for crafting resources, 50 leather and 30 furs. He has many buyers for these products.
